title: Champion Cosplay skins
body: Riot appreciates epic cosplays, so what about creating some cosplay skins for their champions? One idea is an Urgot cosplay skin for Elise, where she has the Frankenstein's monster look, and her spiders are mini Urgots. Nasus and Renekton could cosplay as each other. Ezreal and Taric could cosplay together. Draven could cosplay as himself. Bard could cosplay as a champion that actually matters, lots of combinations. Post your own ideas in the comments and vote in the poll if you want to see this or not.

replies.body: HOW DARE YOU SAY THAT ABOUT BARD!!! D:<
